name: Chicken Chase
description: Chase Chickens in VR! They will run away from you and keep hatching more chicks until you free them. But, don't let the coop get too crowded!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 115 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 115 MB available space
